titleInfo.title: [Survey of properties adjacent to Victoria Avenue and Wellington Street at Barton Street]

physicalDescription.note: 1 map : colour ; 44 x 39 cm. Map lined with archival paper on verso. There are two large tears reaching in from the left and right edges. Two dark stains near the bottom of the map.

mods.note: "Scale 100 ft = 1 inch." "Ths. Allen Blyth P.L.S., Hamilton - Nov. 22nd 1852." "J.H. Cameron". The pink line running down the centre of the map indicates the location of the Great Western Railway. North arrow lacking; north is oriented to the left. Along upper edge, "110 13, Drawer No 1".
